title: CNN+ is shutting down just weeks after it launched
content:
The past few years has seen a wave of new video streaming services, as more media companies realize their potential for profits. However, with the market becoming more saturated all the time, and the monthly budget of most people staying the same (or shrinking), there isn’t much more room for new competitors.
